analysis.key_quote: I oppose this rule because it mirrors the intent and structure of the rescinded Schedule F executive order. These provisions threaten to undermine the merit-based protections that safeguard our federal civil service from politicization.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about undermining merit-based protections and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
